experience.position: Family Caregiver, Volunteer Work, International Relocation
description: Providing family care and support while managing international relocation from the United States to Germany.
Maintained the front end of a legacy content management system that utilized AngularJS and JQuery.
Updated server APIs, in conjunction with the consuming application, to improve data presentation.
Used React to refactor a Flash-based permissions tool.
Participated in a newly created on-call team and authored the document that minimized the time-to-resolution for critical incidents.
Performed system maintenance in AWS and deployed new code to production.
Triaged issues and resolved bugs impacting a content management system.
Assisted business partner development teams with API and framework usage, serving as a subject matter expert on the implementation of RESTful Java services.
Performed system migrations to AWS, and verified both the system functionality and data integrity.
Created training materials to improve the on-boarding process for new team members and business partners.
Developed and implemented processes for ticket standardization, reducing time-to-resolution for all issues, and enabling management to gather metrics and build reports approximately 20% faster.
Employed rapid prototyping to quickly fabricate a model of our product, successfully securing the interest of potential clients and stakeholders.
Delivered modular web components to replace existing SPA infrastructure with one that is flexible, scalable, and maintainable.
Engaged in mobile-first design to enable seamless experiences whether accessing our application via desktop or handheld device.
Participated in the full software development life cycle of mission-critical solutions for the financial services industry, using an agile methodology.
Built configurable interfaces, based on UX and BA requirements, using modern front end technologies.
Developed scalable web applications using the MVC pattern.
Communicated with SQL server, using a REST API.
Worked with developers, project managers, UX designers, and quality assurance personnel to develop technical design, documentation, code, and testing logic.

Participated in a quality remediation effort to resolve approximately 180 defects over the course of 3 months, which resulted in a noticeable improvement in the quality and stability of the application.
Organized a tactical solution, which facilitated the successful implementation of requirements delivered within the last 5 weeks of the development cycle.
Managed the integration of two manufacturing execution systems by coordinating the efforts of three teams, operating in multiple locations.
Designed UI mock-ups and researched architectural requirements for the integration of new system components.
Developed a Proof of Concept prototype to assess the viability of secure document distribution using an embedded browser within the application.
Identified a bottleneck in a recurring data entry process and built a reusable automation script, leveraging PowerShell, for a cross-functional teammate.
Integrated the tool into the team's daily workflow, achieving a 30% reduction in execution time and eliminating error-prone manual steps.
Developed new functionality and corrected existing code for proprietary software, using VB.Net and SQL.
Conducted black box software testing for both web and non-web applications.
Worked closely with both the development and applications departments to perform functional, application, regression, acceptance, multi-user, and workflow testing.
Created and maintained test plans.
